'''Mark Selwyn Hadlow''' (1957) is a [[New Zealand]] actor. He portrayed [[Dori]] in ''[[The Hobbit (film series)]]'', as well as [[Bert]] the [[Troll]] (through motion capture). He had previously worked with [[Peter Jackson]] on ''Meet the Feebles'' and ''King Kong''.

==Roles==
* [[2012]]: ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'' - [[Dori]]
* [[2013]]: ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'' - [[Dori]]
* [[2014]]: ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' - [[Dori]]
